MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA3 postcode area of Kilmarnock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:15pm to safely carry out repair works on our underground cable network on Boyd Court and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:43pm on Friday, 04 December 2020
